item.description:
Midnight Rodeo Bar'sÂ 3 year anniversary party !! We will be giving aways lots of goodies and prizes including:
a pair of tickets to ERIC CHURCH at Meadowbrook U.S. Cellular Pavilion !
a pair of tickets to CLINT BLACK and a pair of tickets to KIX BROOKS at Showcase Live !!

Everyone will recieve a raffle ticket at the door for your chance to WIN !!!!
Band in the house will be HAYWIRE who will be making their first debut!

Lessons with Michelle Jackson at 7:30 PM

DJ Rich between sets

Band on at 9 PM....$10 cover, 21+

Howdy and welcome to new member DAVID WILBUR!!

Wear your NASCAR shirts, hats cuz the theme for this Saturday is NASCAR SATURDAY
item.how_to_find_us: Sign on a table before the bar
item.name: Line and Partner Dancing-Midnight Rodeo Bar's 3rd Anniversary/Nascar Saturday
